name: Sunday Brunch:  Johnny Apple's Crazy Creamy, Crazy Good Scrambled Eggs
description: I don't know what it is, but lately I've been thinking a lot about my dear departed friend Johnny Apple. Eating with Johnny was a fantastic experience. He loved food and wine and life and politics and a zillion other...
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon butter, a pinch or two of salt,
A couple of pinches of salt

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the butter over high heat in a nonstick pan.
Whisk the other ingredients together in a bowl, pour them into the pan and—summon your courage.
Do nothing for 20 seconds, except maybe cross your fingers.
Pause for another 20 seconds, then repeat the gentle stirring-and-folding process.
Take the pan off the heat, allowing the residual heat in the pan to complete the cooking.
